data.name: Gestaltor
data.detailed_description:
Gestaltor is the first visual glTF editor which allows you to natively and directly work on glTF files.

Gestaltor provides you with a powerful interface to massively speed up your workflows. Unleash the true power of glTF in its native environment.

Directly view, inspect, edit, optimize and compose your glTFs exported from any content creation tool and gear them up for deployment in any engine or viewer.
data.about_the_game:
Gestaltor is the first visual glTF editor which allows you to natively and directly work on glTF files.

Gestaltor provides you with a powerful interface to massively speed up your workflows. Unleash the true power of glTF in its native environment.

Directly view, inspect, edit, optimize and compose your glTFs exported from any content creation tool and gear them up for deployment in any engine or viewer.
data.short_description: 100 % glTF editing! Prepare 3D models into high performant real time assets. Make your products ready for the next level of shopping in 3D Commerce!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600 series or later, Radeon HD 7000 series or later, Intel HD 500 series or later
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • OS: MacOS 10.15
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

  • Storage: 200 MB available space
